# TASK::SET_GLOBAL_MIN_BIRD_FLIGHT_HEIGHT

## Summary
Call this every frame to keep birds flying at a height >= the given value.

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** height: Min Z height in meters that birds will be allowed to fly at.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Needs to be looped! And yes, it does work and is not a hash collision.
Birds will try to reach the given height.
